rootedDevice.body: Our app and website do not support rooted cell phones. Please visit them using a different device.

updateApp.body: A new version of the app is required and available to download. Please update now.

offlineError.body: Looks like we’re having trouble connecting. Try to find a better cellular signal or connect to Wi-Fi.

errorScreen.message: Please give us time to fix it. Then, try again.
errorScreen.title: Sorry, something went wrong.

client.description: Explore counseling, wellness, work-life balance, legal, and financial resources.
client.message: Carelon Wellbeing is confidential and available to you at no cost.
client.searchTitle: To get started, enter the exact name of your organization, without punctuation.
client.confirmationMessage: Please confirm that this is the organization you currently belong to.
client.errorMessage: We couldn’t find a match for that organization name. Please check with your benefits administrator for assistance.
client.getStartDescription: Create an account or sign in if you already have one.
client.doNotWantToCreateAccount: Don’t want to create an account?
client.benefitTitle: Which program and benefits would you like to use?
client.mhsudDescription: Use your insurance to access your mental health plan benefits to find providers and other resources.
client.eapDescription: Use your employee assistance program benefits to explore counseling, wellness, work-life balance, legal and financial resources.

home.proivderTitle: Tap into no-cost resources and tools that can help you live your life to the fullest potential.
home.checkOut: Check out our most popular resources.
home.serviceDescription: Find legal support and resources for you and your family.
home.worklifeDescription: Locate work, family and everyday life resources.
home.supportDescription: Let us guide you to the right benefits and resources.
home.wellBeingDescription: Search the full library of articles, podcasts and videos.
home.featuredItemsDescription: Explore the most up-to-date content for this month.
home.criticalEventDescription: If you or someone you care about has been affected by a critical event such as a natural disaster, workplace violence, or school violence, call us anytime day or night at 800-848-9837.
home.learnToLivetDescription: Your emotional wellness is an important part of your overall health. Learn to Live is an online, self-paced tool available to you 24/7 to help you with issues such as stress, depression, and anxiety.
home.midnfulDescription: Access interactive, on-demand mindfulness tools by our partner eM Life that can help to improve your focus, reduce stress, build resilience, and enhance your overall well-being.
home.worklifeWebDescription: Check out recorded seminars that address a wide variety of topics.
home.assessmentAlertMessage: By clicking “I Agree” below, you agree to open the questionnaire in a new window.
home.assessmentErrorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again after sometime.

teleHealth.title: Choose an option below to connect with a mental health professional.
teleHealth.emotionalSupportDesc: Members, dependents, and household family members 10 and older can get matched with a counselor for support via virtual sessions by phone or video.
teleHealth.talkSpaceDescription: Next day counseling appointments by video or text for teens, adults, and couples with mild to moderate issues.
teleHealth.carelonBehavioralDescription: Same or next-day counseling appointments by video or phone for people 8 years and older with mild to moderate issues Available in select states.
teleHealth.searchCounselorsDescription: Find Carelon Wellbeing network counselors and facilities throughout the country, then make an appointment.

signUp.description: Please add your personal details below.

accountSetUp.description: Now let’s set up your account.
accountSetUp.voiceMailDescription: Can we reach out to you at registered phone number and leave voicemails if necessary?

deleteAccountPage.title: Deleting digital account
deleteAccountPage.header: If you delete your digital account, you will immediately lose access to our app. You will not be able to digitally view or manage:
deleteAccountPage.note: Note: You will still have health insurance coverage and benefits and will be able to visit doctors and other healthcare professionals.
deleteAccountPage.confirmationHeader: If you delete your digital account you will immediately lose access to our app. You will not be able to digitally view or manage: EAP Profile.
deleteAccountPage.accountConfirmation: Please confirm you want to delete your digital account by checking the box and clicking the button below:
deleteAccountPage.deletedMessage: You have successfully deleted your account. You no longer have access to our app. To regain access, you need to register again after few days

wellnessTopicsPage.description: Select the wellness topics you would like to receive content for.

providers.providerDescription: Provider Search is a Carelon Behavioral Health (Carelon) online directory tool for locating providers and offers you the ability to locate network providers
providers.providerText: Select to send multiple meeting requests

providers.clickContinue: To request an appointment, click continue.

providerDetail.description: You have selected the provider search program. If you are unable to locate a network provider through our directory, please call the number on the back of your health insurance card for assistance in locating a network provider. Please note that prior to beginning any care or program with a provider, you should contact Beacon Health Options to obtain benefits and be notified of any requirements specific to your benefit plan where applicable. This site is protected by reCAPTCHA and the Google,
providerDetail.infoSavedDescription: Thanks for your input. We have shared your profile correction with the provider.

immediateAssistance.title: Immediate Assistance
immediateAssistance.emergencyService: If you require emergency services, call
immediateAssistance.mentalHealthCrisis: . If you are experiencing a mental health crisis, call
immediateAssistance.subTitle: Get Immediate Assistance
immediateAssistance.description: If you require emergency services, call 911. If you care experiencing a mental health crisis, call 988.
immediateAssistance.callDescription: To view a list of crisis support hotlines, click the button below.
immediateAssistance.crisisHotlinesDescription: If you are in need of crisis support, call 988 in the US or call hotline listed below.

errors.noResultsFound: Sorry, but there were no results found. Please try again and with different search criteria.

fullScreenError.title: We’ve encountered an unknown error
fullScreenError.description: Your request couldn’t be completed. Please try again later. For support, call us at

appUnavailable.title: The Carelon Wellbeing app is currently unavailable
appUnavailable.description: We’re updating the app to serve you better. For immediate support, please contact your program administrator at

requestAppointment.title: Request an appointment
requestAppointment.description: Getting set up with a Carelon affiliated mental health counselor is a simple, three step process.

clinicalQuestionnaire.title: Clinical questionnaire
clinicalQuestionnaire.description: First, we’ll get some details regarding the problem you’re facing.
clinicalQuestionnaire.lessProductive: During the past 30 days, how many days were you less productive than usual?
clinicalQuestionnaire.jobMissedDays: During the past 30 days, how many days did you miss from your job because of your behavioral health issues?

counselorSetting.title: Counselor settings
counselorSetting.description: Then you’ll determine the settings for the counselors you’ve selected.
counselorSetting.settingsInfo: Select a preferred data and time for your appointment request (applies to all selected counselors).
counselorSetting.choosePreferredDate: Choose your preferred date and time

review.title: Review and submit
review.description: Finally, you’ll review the details and submit your appointment requests.

identifyRequesterModal.title: Identify Requester
identifyRequesterModal.description: Please identify who is requesting this appointment.

confirmExperienceModal.title: Confirm Experience
confirmExperienceModal.description: Are you experiencing any of the following:
confirmExperienceModal.hurtingContent: Thoughts of hurting yourself or others

contactModal.title: Please Call
contactModal.appointmentForSomeOne: To request an appointment for someone else, please call
contactModal.serviceRepresentatives: and one of our service representatives will assist you.

helpModal.title: Help is available right now
helpModal.certifiedCounselor: Violence and thoughts of self-harm are serious matters. Our Carelon Wellbeing care team has certified counselors available 24/7, who are ready to listen and help. Talk to a counselor by calling
helpModal.emergencyService:
.

If you require emergency services, call
helpModal.mentalHealthCrisis: . If you are experiencing a mental health crisis, call

reviewDetails.title: Review details
reviewDetails.description: Review the details and request an appointment.
reviewDetails.requestAppointmentDescription: Meet with a highly-qualified and experienced counselor in-person or virtually.
reviewDetails.readyToSubmitTitle: You are ready to submit your appointment request
reviewDetails.readyToSubmitDescription: If the counselor is available during the date and time you selected, they will confirm the request and your appointment will be scheduled. If there’s a scheduling conflict, the counselor may reject or propose a new time for the appointment.
reviewDetails.readyToSubmitSubDescription: Be sure you check your email for the counselor’s response within 72 hours.
reviewDetails.appointmentRequestedDescription: Thank you for submitting your appointment request. The counselor should respond within 72 hours.
reviewDetails.appointmentErrorDescription: We’re sorry but there was an unexpected error and we were not able to save your appointment. Please try again.

selectedDays.title: Select the day(s)
selectedDays.description: Select the days you are available for your appointment.

selectTimeRange.title: Select a time range
selectTimeRange.description: Select the time(s) you are available for your appointment.

preSelected.title: Counselor Pre-Selected
preSelected.customerSupportMessage: because you have completed a visit with this counselor. To request an appointment with a different counselor, please call the customer support team at

benefits.title: Explore your EAP benefits today
benefits.description: Get started with counseling, wellness, legal, financial, and work-life balance resources.

healthCounselor.title: Connect with a mental health counselor
healthCounselor.description: Find a mental health professional for in-person or telehealth-based counseling.

wellnessContent.title: Receive new wellness content every month
wellnessContent.description: Select the topics you’re interested in and get wellness articles, podcasts, and videos

chat.startChatDescription: To chat with a customer support representative, please fill out the required fields below. This information is only used to follow-up and is never shared.
chat.startChatSupportDescription: For support outside chat hours of 8 a.m. to 8 p.m. ET, please call
chat.chatOfflineDescription: Chat support is available from 8 a.m. to 8 p.m. ET.
chat.chatOfflineSupportDescription: For immediate support outside of chat hours, please call

login.description: Welcome to Carelon Behavioral Health. Log in to access your benefits, claims, member information, out-of-pocket spending, and support.

drawer.title: Create an account to start your journey toward  whole-person health
drawer.info1: Access your member and benefits information
drawer.info2: Check the status of your claims and expenses
drawer.info3: Stay in touch with your provider

createAccount.title: Create Account
createAccount.receiveNotifications: Receive notifications or calls from providers
createAccount.description: The health information contained herein is provided by Carelon Behavioral Health solely for information purposes.  Carelon Behavioral Health assumes no responsibility or liability for any circumstances rising out of the use, misuse, interpretation, or application of any information supplied on this website. Please contact Carelon Behavioral Health if you have any questions or concern about the information provided.​
createAccount.disclaimer: Please affirm that you are authorized to access, receive, and use the information.
createAccount.verifyEmailDescription: To finish creating your account, verify your email by clicking the link we sent to your inbox. Your link will remain valid for 24 hours.
createAccount.emailResent: A verification link has been resent to your inbox
